problem.markdown:
1. Which is commonly used metal for grinding wheel? ( ) Cast Iron ( ) Stainless Steel (x) Copper ( ) Aluminium
2. For grinding steel workpiece which is the commonly used abrasive material? ( ) Ceramic ( ) Zinc Oxide ( ) Glass Powder (x) Aluminium Oxide
problem.p: 1. Which is commonly used metal for grinding wheel?
2. For grinding steel workpiece which is the commonly used abrasive material?
